Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Stylish \Styl"ish\, a. Having style or artistic quality; given to, or fond of, the display of style; highly fashionable; modish; as, a stylish dress, house, manner. -- {Styl"ish*ly}, adv. -- {Styl"ish*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
stylishly adv : in a stylish manner; "she was dressed very stylishly"
